website_summaries.verdict: The best leg and calf massager with a focus on promoting good circulation.
pros: Leg wraps cover both the calf and feet at the same time, using separate massaging airbags
Comes with a large mesh bag for storage and transportation
cons: Item may be too large for smaller legs where equal pressure cannot be applied

customer_reviews.title: PERDECT—- VERY Effective as an SCD
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let others confuse you. NOT A MASSAGER. It’s a (.semi) sequential compression device to help move circulation/fluid from feet into lymph drains
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Excited about the results
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mother and she loves it!! She’s had a problem with swelling and poor circulation for years. Her legs stayed swollen and even blistery. She’s taken water pills and other meds but they only ran her to the bathroom on still swollen legs. Now since she’s had this product she’s happy and her legs look and feel normal. She uses them at least once a day. Finally she has something she can use to get relief!! Excellent product !!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Granville

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: Item works well, but I wish the description made it clear that both legs must be massaged. It doesn't work unless both air pumps are attached to the controls, but if only one leg needs the massage, it gets too tight if you only wear one leg.
customer_reviews.author: juliana patti

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little on the large size, got for my wife who works alot and always has pain in her feet and calves. This product was a little to large for her legs as we had to tighten them all the way and sometimes the velcro would release due to pressure and not alot of hold. I tried it out, it is a great product. Really compresses your legs to hit pressure points and releases at intervals that really relieves pain. Would definetly buy another for a family or friend
customer_reviews.author: Alex t.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good for circulation
customer_reviews.text: I recently had surgery and my doctor said these would be good. These are good for circulation. They help so you don't get blood clots when you don't move around a lot. They fit my legs and feet good. I like the way it feels. They are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Taxlady

customer_reviews.title: Fit King Saved Me Money!
customer_reviews.text: Ease to use, set it and relax! I have lymphedema in my legs, and I ordered this product because I had this compression treatment during my initial lymphedema therapy two years ago. My lymphedema massage therapist recommended a machine that was bulky and to cumbersome, and there was the uncertainty of whether or not my health insurance would cover it. This was worth every penny for me. I use it when I go to bed, and its it's safe to use because it shuts off after 20 minutes. I usually do two rotations. In the morning, my legs feel lighter, look great, and I am ready to face the day. Thank you Fit King!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Frink

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: So very pleased with this purchase. First, it is nicely packaged. I followed the easy instructions and my husband was enjoying his massage within minutes. He was so relaxed, within minutes he was asleep. I've asked him several questions about the comfort during use and he states that it feels very comfortable and soothing. Super pleased with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: gaylon owens

customer_reviews.title: 😒
customer_reviews.text: These boots put high pressure on small areas, causing bruising. They are nothing like hospital compression gear.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's not anything like the boots you wear in the hospital , it is very soothing. This one squeezes the heck out of your legs, like a blood pressure cuff that's to tight. Very uncomfortable. Not doing much for swelling and pain.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: Made WORSE than better
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this massager 3 times . I got swollen legs and veins. The massager was pressing certain areas in my bottom of my leg. It was pressing on my arch and heel area and after the massager stoped I started having pain in this area. Since the morning until now which is almost 2 pm I got the pain and discomfort. The massager just pressing different areas without even knowing if it will do good or not. It’s only a machine. Someone can really have damage in their leg after using it . Will definitely going to return this massager back !! Not recommending at all!!
customer_reviews.author: AngelaB

customer_reviews.title: Boa constrictor? yes. Easy to adjust for a comfortable fit, Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen the reviews of this thing feeling like a boa constrictor getting a hold of you. And those are correct... unless you spend about 2 minutes adjusting them! The foot area and the calf area have massive adjustments via the velcro, and all you do is make them bigger than you would expect. Easy fix. I have poor circulation to my feet and 1-2 cycles with these and they feel great again. Pretty decent for this price point. If they are too tight for you (you will know right away) just open the velcro up until the pressure intensity is to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: T. Krill

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: When I order this I thought it was a fair price although after 3 months it just stopped turning on. For the price that I paid I expected it to work for longer than that. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: QUIT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT WAS GREAT UNTIL IT JUST QUIT WORKING AFTER ONLY A FEW MONTHS USAGE. HUSBAND NEEDS THIS FOR HIS PAIN HE ENDURES EVERY DAY 24/7. VERY DISAPPOINTED>
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Williams

customer_reviews.title: heavenly relief
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I received them last night and used them for an hour! It was a bit inconsistent at times which is why I gave four stars instead of five. A couple of times it got a little tight on my calf but over all it felt wonderful. Also, I had less pain when walking immediately after as well as this morning when I got up. My only concern is that others had trouble with it not working after three months so if mine does stop working I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Soothing remedy for swollen feet and legs
customer_reviews.text: I have swollen feet and legs, from what I assume is living a very sedentary life due to arthritis and spinal stenosis. I spend much of my day on my desktop computer. My daughter recently bought me this wonderful improvement for my feet and legs, and it is a pleasure wearing them! It feels so pleasing on this area and I'm sure it improves the circulation with the pulsating movements as opposed to having little to no movement. If you have these issues like I do, I would indeed recommend using your money to purchase this as an investment to your health and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Deal

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, do not buy. OUCH.
customer_reviews.text: Most horrible. Hurt to use, I must be to thin to enjoy. Pressure was way to intense. I tried to return but ended up in hospital and went past my time. So I have these awful things just wasting away while I don't have money to waste did.
customer_reviews.author: hlp

customer_reviews.title: It works and feels fantastic
customer_reviews.text: OMG I simply love it. I got cellulitis had to have knee surgery because of poor circulation in my legs my Dr was worried about blood clots. And this is amazing. It goes deep into the musles
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Great product,true to description,easy to use!Highly recommend!Even PT said was smart buy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad after knee replacement surgery. Hes 72...and skeptical of most things and he is really liking it so far. Very easy to put on and off (highly recommend this bc of velcro it is 100% better for anyone then zipper) the remote is easy for him to use and understand. He said he actually works extremely well on his foot which is a bonus. Highly recommend. Both cousins that work with him and physical therapist say it was a smart buy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Joubert Bearb

customer_reviews.title: Died after two uses..
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve got small legs. I mean smaller then normal then these would probably fit you. Then you have to hope that the pump works. After fighting and adding extra Velcro I finally got them kinda on and they partially did the job. I was pretty swollen so I was happy with the results the first two times but on the third time the pump was dead. So it’s being returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: These work SO well for me in combating the edema that I am so prone to in my legs/feet. Worked WONDERFULLY after a major orthopedic surgery where I was unable to walk for 2 months. This has been a lifesaver! I will continue to use them long after I am healed up, and I doubt I will ever fly on a plane or take a road trip without them! I tend to get awful swelling from traveling, and these will be a great help on the other side of a long flight or day on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Erie

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: I have a compression machine with the longer "sleeves" for each leg (doctor prescribed) but messed up one of the sleeves so decided to try this. Nice in one way as they are easier to get on my legs but the pressure is too light on the left (polio) leg and the right leg doesn't work at all. Not at all!!! I need more pressure on my polio leg than what this gives so thanks but no thanks, I'll stick with the professional stuff. This was a total waste of my $90.00 that I should have used for the professional model. I lost the receipt so lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: C. Short

customer_reviews.title: Previous DVT's and this Massager noticibly reduced the swelling in my feet and legs
customer_reviews.text: I am a (very) Senior with a history of vascular problems and only limited ability to exercise properly. I tried the Fit King product with almost immediate results (My Nike Slip Ons, which had been tight-fitting now slide, now are easier to slide into.) My Primary Physician endorsed using a product like this to help my circulation. The only caution is the velcro bindings really 'stick', and could be a problem with persons with limited strength in their hands an fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Commercial grade material. Great performance.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and commercial grade material. Very easy to put on with two large velcro pieces that allow for different sizes to fit from small to large. Also includes extra pieces to extend for extra large legs. Air hoses made of quality flexible tubing. Different setting from low to high setting. Also able to set for just feet, just calves or feet and calves simultaneously. Very sleek and modern looking product. I am very satisfied even though I haven't had them for very long. I have had one other similar product and these are much more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: gina wiltz

customer_reviews.title: What a great way to relax
customer_reviews.text: I love to get home and put these boots on and relax. The settings are great from a light squeeze to a grip that will melt the hardest of knots. Easy to use and definitely worth the purchase. Only draw back is you have to restart it with no option to set it longer. But that is no big deal, unless you fall asleep. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Waschill

customer_reviews.title: Just not worth it..way OVERPRICED
customer_reviews.text: All this product does is squeeze the heck out of your legs...WAY OVERPRICED
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Roman

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item it worked for about a week after that it just stop working the pump stop pumping air and it just keeps shutting off I would give 5 stars if the company would improve and replace the motor
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Love the massage
customer_reviews.text: They are somewhat clumsy to put on. Hoping it will get easier the more I use them. The air compression massage works well.
customer_reviews.author: Indy

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This really hurt and was kinda awkward to use. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: J. V. R.

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: My Dad has had edema in his legs for over a year. Even to the point where water was leaking from his legs - so heartbreaking. It made it difficult to get around. He exercised, watched sodium intake - etc. Other than the leg swelling he is very healthy for 70 years old. He's been to many appointments attempting to fix this issue and has been given prescriptions such as water pills, etc. In 3 days these boots have been able to return his legs to NORMAL. Y'all - why didn't doctors try this? Why didn't I think of this before? My Dad has is life back. So thankful.
customer_reviews.author: Brynnlee

customer_reviews.title: If you suffer from rls don’t hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my mom who suffers from sever restless leg syndrome, poor circulation, and nerve pain. She absolutely loves them. Only negative is that sometimes the cable for the boots unplug easily stopping air from circulating l. Other than that they are life savers, beats taking medication. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who is a truck driver, so when he would comeh home after weeks on the road, his legs and feet would be so swollen and sore. Since I gave him this he hasn't come home with swollen feet or legs! Its absolutley amazing and he loves it. Its pretty simple to use and the results are so worth it! I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Ruehle

customer_reviews.title: Massager works great
customer_reviews.text: The product fits wide calves and feet very well. The only negative thing I have to say is its loud. I wish the noise was a lot quieter.
customer_reviews.author: phylisha thomas

customer_reviews.title: My Mother Loves These!
customer_reviews.text: My mom is 65, has poor circulation, overweight, a heart condition and her legs are constantly swollen, so I bought these for her to see if they would help! She LOVES them! It’s the first time she doesn’t have cankles. She’s also able to walk around for longer distances without her legs getting completely swollen. She loves them so much, she bought her sister a pair....guess she’s paying it forward! I bought a separate plugin adapter to use in the car, but it didn’t work.....it couldn’t been our car though (it’s a hybrid and the electrical plugin’s is a little iffy in our Ford Fusion).
customer_reviews.author: rjv4EVER

customer_reviews.title: Diabetic
customer_reviews.text: The boots were very easy to use and put on, they would probably work better for me but pressure was not good for my nerothpy, caused some pain in legs. Please read warnings before using.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: I got some bad bruises from the Fit King!
customer_reviews.text: I got some bad bruises on both sides of my legs in identical spots from using the Fit Kings. I have been somewhat desperate to cure the fluid leaking from the interior of my ankles and have been to 3 doctors. On my own I bought the Fit Kings on Amazon hoping it would be the cure but I have stopped using them because of the bruising. I have used it at the lowest pressure. I am very disappointed after had reading other people's great reviews. Do they work for Fit King? I was going to post pics but they are pretty nasty
customer_reviews.author: David Des

customer_reviews.title: Under this ooerational circumstances this product can not be taken and used anywhere
customer_reviews.text: The only negative part of this product is the battery system which is not a rechargeable battery so if you wanna use it you have to be close to an outlet otherwise the air keg massage is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Arnnie

customer_reviews.title: Help relieve swelling
customer_reviews.text: It kinda hurts and feels good at the same time. Does help when your feet are swollen
customer_reviews.author: melissa shaw

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous help!
customer_reviews.text: I am 41 years old. Ever since having my child in my 30’s, my feet have swollen up be the end of each day. I would beg my husband to rub them and pop my toes for some sense of relief. Since getting this 2 weeks ago, I have seen major improvement! It allows me to walk so much more comfortably! My feet do still hurt, but I no longer have the swelling and throbbing on top of the hurting feet! I highly recommend this if you have any sort of circulation issues/daily swelling that throbs!
customer_reviews.author: robinsdomain

customer_reviews.title: Feel good
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and have it on now. It feel real good I work in a warehouse 10 hours a day. I will see how I feel in the morning cause usually when I wake up my legs feel real heavy from a long week of work.
customer_reviews.author: Arecia

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: This item I returned because it didn’t work it wouldn’t turn ON
customer_reviews.author: Lovey Vidinha

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a massage just a compression and after a while it hurts your legs the strap on foot hurts the skin
customer_reviews.author: sadia

customer_reviews.title: Why get an expensive chair when this inexpensive product can help your legs and feet?
customer_reviews.text: I deal with calf tightness as well as restless leg syndrome. I've been using at bedtime and the Fit King does provide symptom relief such that I can go to sleep sooner and sleep a bit sounder. I'm having trouble, though, trying to figure out how to alter the product to accommodate my larger feet. The "cut sewing lines" instructions do not yet make sense to me. I'm reluctant to cut. Until I can figure that out I believe there will be too much pressure on my feet which is quite uncomfortable. It would have helped if the manual were written by someone better acqainted with the English language.
customer_reviews.author: gmshero

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My job requires me to stand for a long time every day. And every time I come home, my calves are very sore and swollen. I searched for this on the Internet for a long time. I chose to buy this product and I'm very surprised at the results, my legs are very comfortable, and the swelling has basically disappeared the next morning, I highly recommend this product to anyone where your work requires you to be standing for a long time or if have you any leg problems.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Saddened
customer_reviews.text: As a lymphedema patient I was looking forward to some relief with this product. SIMPLY.... it did NOT WORK !! The END !!
customer_reviews.author: Ann B. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Heaven sent
customer_reviews.text: I am 6 feet, a little over 200 lbs. My work includes standing 10-12 hours a day. Lately, noticed some bulging veins in both legs, with leg aches. Ready to go in less than 5 minutes including opening the box. It feels amazingly good. God!! Thank you for blessing the makers of this thing with the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Xdx7

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Circulation
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I've had issues with blood clots in the past and this works wonderfully to help relax my legs. The massager slowly tightens and loosens around your leg to really get every area, and it fits my foot perfectly. The three straps really keep it secure. Once its plugged in and you push the button it starts working immediately. Great product overall and I'm looking forward to buying more FIT KING products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boni

customer_reviews.title: Aids in Circulation & Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: This leg massager is similar to those used in hospitals to aid in patient circulation. Though cumbersome (it helps to have a caregiver put it on), it does benefit my Dad who suffers from poor circulation. PROS: (1) user controls the speed & pressure ensuring comfort, and (2) the user can massage both legs at once. CONS: The control cord is too short & it’s heavier than others we have tried. In the end, it's all about the patient and in our case, my Dad has found relief using the massager. I can visibly see pressure in the veins is being released.
customer_reviews.author: ActiveShopperGal

customer_reviews.title: Worked GREAT, Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This product gave my mom some comfort before she passed away. Doctors wouldn't touch her because they knew if they did it would hurt her. She developed a skin irritation after chemo treatments 7 years ago. I didn't think she would allow this to be put on but she did. Her get and ankles were so swollen she had water blisters. These helped to keep the swelling down and that comforted her. She wore them and they worked great. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex in Springfield

customer_reviews.title: Reduce swelling effortlessly
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped with my husbands swelling and pain so much, he requests it morning and evening. He was needing his legs massaged daily and I could not keep up. This has been a game changer. So glad we found it.
customer_reviews.author: Sewbabe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: They do what they said they would do. Worked great
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Really good leg compressor
customer_reviews.text: This leg compressor is my go to leg massager after a long day of work. This allows you to relieve muscle cramps after walking/running a lot, or even over use of your leg muscles. It is even perfect for my relatives since their legs have uncomforting pain once in a while. Even during cold nights or when my blood flow isn’t circulation through my feet easily, the compressor helps circulate your blood flow so you won’t have pins and needle feeling, or numbness. A very good leg compressor overall
customer_reviews.author: Ri Q.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible but one thing. . . .
customer_reviews.text: I am a 6' tall 56 years old with leg inseam of 36". I would have given this a five star rating if the boot height was just a little taller. Falls just a little shorter than my ideal height for my cramps. But very light weight I have taken it on road trips and short vacations where I knew I would be walking a lot and needing some loving attention. Motor is sometimes a little bit loud when trying to watch television quietly. The humming could be a little lower but it is not over bearing. I would buy it again and gift it to others without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: WmsFamilyMom

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my mom since she stands on her feet for long periods of time. They definitely help my moms tired feet but it's not the best machine out there for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nayeli Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad... he has severe nerve damage. This gave him relief on those bad pain days. I’m glad I got it for him.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for water retention.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. Wish I had known about them b4 tissue damage in my legs had started from fluid retention. But I bought them and I use them every time I sit down and also use them while driving long distance, except I keep my gas foot out of the boot and fold it behind me but still use the calf part. Legs were not swollen when I got home. Very easy to travel with and use anywhere I can sit down with power. Buy a power converter when you buy the boots do you can use you your vehicle power source. Comes with a little travel sack. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Big Tre

customer_reviews.title: Great and effective
customer_reviews.text: These massage boots really helped me. I’ve been dealing with circulation issues for many years and due to partial disability, my left leg and feet swallow. These boots are wonderful and when I use them I can totally see how it helps my feet come back to normal. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: I love mine you can NOT have them back LOL
customer_reviews.text: These would cost you hundreds of dollars if gotten from Doc or hospitals and they are the same thing they use,Warning do not use on Hi setting until you read book or try them on low this thing really get the job done, they can get real tight on hi.They seem to be made of good material and last a good long time if take care of them.For fitting, I,m 245lb and they fit geart.If you have swelling in your legs you should do with your Doctor.I have poor circulation and they have made my legs tell better.
customer_reviews.author: runinnhorse

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful contraption
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to assemble and use, no problems. It’s more of a pressurized massage on your calf and bottom feet areas and indeed very relaxing. I ordered it for my husband after his torn calf muscle injury and it's soothing yet firm on the injured muscle. Then I tried it just for shits and giggles and it turns out to be very relaxing and soothing on my restless leg syndrome. Highly recommend. I guess you could even throw it in your suitcase when you travel as it comes with a bag and doesn’t take up too much space. Best to use before bedtime or when you just woke up.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: As pictured.
customer_reviews.text: They came a day early and I was so happy. They feel amazing, after just one session the swelling in my feet and legs went down. They are buulky and you must remain in one spot. The motor is very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon's  mom.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I would like to know what the store thinks of this.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jo Shell

customer_reviews.title: ***If you are in the market for a great leg massager? Look no further!***
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Fit King leg massager for my mother. She has arthritis in her knees. She is not able to walk very well due to the pain and inflammation. The Leg Massager has been a God send. It helps with her pain and edema in her legs. By the way Great customer service too. They stand behind their product... After a 6 weeks of operation the unit stopped working. I contacted customer service and they had a replacement unit sent to mom.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kauterman

customer_reviews.title: good for swollen legs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to work on my cavs while pregnant. They are great at helping circulation on my legs and getting rid of that annoying tingling feeling.
customer_reviews.author: K Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Massaging leg compression works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with my feet and ankles swelling. This compression set really helps with that. I use it 3 or 4 times at night and it brings the swelling down and overall makes my legs feel better before I go to bed. Not as robust as the system you would get at a physical therapist office but for home use this is definitely a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: trinity1

customer_reviews.title: Effective and immediate relief
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my roommate, who has a genetic condition that often leaves her feet, calves, and legs throbbing if on her feet for too long. She noticed immediate results when using it after long shifts on her feet, and said that it has drastically decreased pain and swelling in her feet,ankles, and calves. I additionally struggle with foot/ankle/ leg pain from previous sports injuries, and also deal with swelling issues if on my feet for an extended period of time. This product has been almost magical in its immediate amelioration of both issues. I highly recommend this to anyone who deals with these types of injuries/ chronic pain. It is effective and provides immediate relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Henninger

customer_reviews.title: Great while they lasted... which wasn’t very long
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift to my father who used them about 4 times before they stopped working entirely.... they won’t even turn on and it’s been 32 days so apparently I can’t even return them.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Brashares

customer_reviews.title: Kind of works
customer_reviews.text: I order this about a week ago. I thought it compressed on my feet, ankles and calves, but it only seems to be compressing on my calves. Really my only small gripe, it seems to help with the swelling. Think if it compressed in those areas it might be more effective, but not disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Stark

customer_reviews.title: Calf and feet relief
customer_reviews.text: Like these a lot. I didn't see the longer ones that cover the thighs before buying these but these work well. Massage the lower half of leg reply well..
customer_reviews.author: Peter perez

customer_reviews.title: Leg massage boots.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father in law who’s diabetic and has issues with his legs. He’s been using it daily for the past 2 weeks and according to him he hasn’t noticed much of difference. He says it feels like a light massage/vibration. I guess it didn’t work for him.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Benevides

customer_reviews.title: Worked 2 times then died and never would turn on again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used it 2 times once on each setting then it stopped working completely!!!!! I tried it in different sockets and nothing it wouldn’t turn on. I followed the directions I don’t know what happened but it was disappointing to only get 2 uses out of it !
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent therapeutic device!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent therapy for sore legs & feet. It's a boot like from calf to your whole foot with adjustable pads & extenders. This is a must have for arthritis or if you have chronic pain as I do and lay in bed a lot. This helps me to prevent blood clots. I highly recommend this. For the price & high quality!
customer_reviews.author: R. Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express how amazing these are. I am a nurse working on my feet all day and I can't wait to get home each shift to use these! I thought they were going to be just like sequential compression devices like we use in the hospital but they are so much more! Finally some relief from leg and foot pain without having to beg my husband for a massage!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I just used it for the 1st time. I’m 37 yrs old and have circulation issues from my calf to the top of my feet and swollen ankles. I wore it for 20 minutes until it turned itself off. It’s not the most comfortable feeling and at times hurt. I even thought they were going to burst a few time with how much air was blowing into them. I’ll update my review in a week or two when I notice results
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Well I didn't expect these to be as effective as the lymphedema pumps used by doctors and nursing facilities, I did expect it to pump and massage. I could barely feel these on my legs and the sleeves barely inflated.
customer_reviews.author: kcd92262

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and are healthy to use to keep your leg and feet stimulated.. I put them on while I watch tv
customer_reviews.author: Mabby

customer_reviews.title: Best massager ever.
customer_reviews.text: My husband always has restless leg syndrome. These squeeze his calves and feet, it’s amazing how much it helps. I tried them too and fell asleep in them lol. They are very adjustable, we are small, his feet are size 8, but these will fit his and much larger if needed. They are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Durrett

customer_reviews.title: Love this. But it doesn’t seem to be lasting long
customer_reviews.text: I really do love these, as I use them daily. The only problem I am having now is, I purchased these back in October of 2019 (7.5 months ago) and now it only works periodically. You will hear the pump start up and it will Cut off within 10-15 seconds. I’ve emailed the company twice, hope to hear back soon. Surely there’s at least a 1 year manufacturers warranty to replace a part of its shorting out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cash

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with edema
customer_reviews.text: My mom has swollen legs and feet from edema, the massagers have worked great to help with circulation and from having elephant feet.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Chen

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a massage.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! It takes putting them on a few times before you get the hang of it and after that, they are so easy. It really feels like a massage not just a bunch of airbags squeezing. My only complaint would be that the tubes between the wraps and the remote are too short. But the pros far outweigh the one con. Yes I would recommend this as a matter of fact I'm buying one as a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jamerson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These massage boots are so good for relaxing my husband's edema swollen legs and feet. They are not a cure, but they sure make him feel better. He can put his shoes on a lot easier after the massage sessions. This was an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SAT

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: While in the hospital receiving a double lung transplant, I had medical versions of the inflating foot and lower calf compressor. They were made with a soft, flecked vynal and were amazingly comfortable. This product has stiff edges that leave deep indentions on my feet and legs.
customer_reviews.author: William Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It
customer_reviews.text: I use these before I go to bed everyday and it squeezes your feet with air and while using it, you don't feel the massage, but once you unwrap your legs from the massager, you feel 10lbs lighter. It feels amazing, buying one for my parents as well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Finally relief!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my feet all day walking on cement floors, been doing it for 30 years. My physical therapist used something similar to this, so I thought I would give them a try. Wow I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: These are great . I have a lot of pain in my legs .. I was very reluctant on buying them ... so glad I did been using them every day now ! It’s better than having a leg massage... good product if need relief from lower leg pain or foot pain !!
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing!!! It was shipped to me very fast!! I tried this equip once I got it. It is really easy to use. All you need is to put charger on and use the controller to select the model whatever you like. It’s was really comfortable n give u such a gentle massage. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband has to walk a lot every night to deliver food to the homeless. His calves are so sore, so I bought this leg massager for him. He loves it because it can massage his cramped and tense calves powerfully, relax his muscles and relieve fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: isabel

customer_reviews.title: Helps my aching legs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after leaving hospital/rehab to have compression boots at home. I leave them loose and just slide them on and off. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin V.

customer_reviews.title: Bought it after reading several reviews of various products. I made the best choice
customer_reviews.text: I had to read several reviews of various products before I made this purchase. Several reviews were contradictory. Here’s mine - I am so glad I ordered it. I used to have pain in my legs and feet every night. Magically - it’s gone after using it just for 2 days. I use it every day and I love it. The sound is a bit high when you use and it’s a bit bulky so have to pack it after use but that’s not the reason I bought it. I bought it to get relief in my feet and legs and that it took care of from the very first use
customer_reviews.author: Munish Mahajan

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR these are good
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes can not get out for walks (STAY AT HOME STUFF) and find a little bit of leg swelling, which these things seem to eliminate. Seem to only work as a PAIR instead of being able to just do a single leg but maybe I missed something in the manual. Careful, you may want a nap afterwards, since your feet are already comfortable ;)
customer_reviews.author: Standard Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. I suffer with vericose veins and have a lot of leg, ankle, and foot pain. This leg massager helps tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A God Send !
customer_reviews.text: I never thought there would be anything to help me with my birth defect, Milroy's Disease. I used this as soon as I received it two days ago, and it has helped me soooooooo much ! Swelling is significantly reduced ! So thankful for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Adams

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a “ massager” other than an air compressor. I use it to loose up my calf muscle when I got done with my workouts. I am not a big fan of wires, wish I had bought the wireless one which would be more convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon Not Lime

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She is 5'4" and about 130lbs. They work perfect on her feet and legs
customer_reviews.author: tamrick

customer_reviews.title: Came in handy for more serious healing
customer_reviews.text: I recently wrote a review rightly after my purchase 4 months ago, but how often do you have something that comes in handy.. my mom just had knee surgery and need a cooling pad and leg compressions.. with insurance her out of pocket expense was going to be $750... I already have the leg compression boots that I purchased here for $79, so I got her the cooling pad here for $27 I believe this combination was a great savings for her and her healing is already on its way.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy L

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my cousin who couldn't put on compression socks herself. She can put these on herself and after some use her swelling has gone down. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Brant

customer_reviews.title: No 12 Volt power cord. Not really portable.
customer_reviews.text: Do not be fooled. This is not truly “Portable”. It does not come with a simple 12 V power cord. There is no way to plug it into an auto or RV 12 V Outlet. When I get to a hotel and a 110 v outlet, I may write more once I am over my disappointment. Rating of zero since it cannot be used on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Danamaz P.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I don't review an item that often - but this product is awesome. The pressure is easily controlled by tightening or releasing the velco. It has pressure settings plus 2 different sequence options. It also comes with extra Velcro sleeves that can be attached for people with wider calves. Great buy -
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it works !!!
customer_reviews.text: So many times items don’t work as advertised. These did !! So easy to use and started seeing results in just a few days . I’m on my feet all day , I’ve been wearing compression socks but they weren’t doing enough. Swelling was just getting worse. When I get home from work now , I elevate my legs and use the Fit King leg air massager. I can tell the difference . Wow, can’t say enough good things . Love these. Start off on lowest setting , you will be surprised how strong the massage is , I have big calf’s and use the extenders. Wish I’d bought these long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. W

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use ! Fast Delivery ! Well Packaged ! I can feel a difference with the first use ....excellent for blood circulation . Item has three settings from mild to very intense . Perfect and what I needed .
customer_reviews.author: Jeneal Daniels

customer_reviews.title: I
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my swelling in legs and helps the pain in my feet I fractured my tibia in two places I am going to tell people about this I have a question there was a white box in my box but there was not anything in it did I get everything I just got this Monday
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer debbie morgan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing worth every Penney
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to start off by saying . To all my elders before me WHY Did you not let me know it’s painful to get old . Wow , that said this is a great product . I’ve tried a few different techniques to help me with the circulation in my feet . This amazing brace does it all hands down .
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Sanchez

product_meta.title: FIT KING Leg Air Massager for Circulation and Relaxation Foot and Calf Massage with Handheld Controller 3 Intensities 2 Modes(with 2 Extensions)
feature_bullets: FEET & CALVES MASSAGE-this leg and foot air massager is used to massage your feet and calves, 2x2 air bags inside, press the foot and calf muscle from lower to upper to relieve fatigue and improve the circulation.

2 MODES & 3 MASSAGE INTENSITIES-you can easily control this massager by the handheld controller, 2 massage modes and 3 Intensities selectable, powered by DC12V/1A adapter (UL Plug), detailed user manual in 5 language.

10 MASSAGE TECHNIQUES-There are 2 different massage modes with more massage techniques provide better massage experience than before. No matter young people works in office, or parents or grandparents stay at home, this air massager can safely and easily relieve their fatigue for daily use and improve circulation after long-term use.

LARGER & ADJUSTABLE SIZE WITH SIZE EXTENSIONS-the leg and foot wraps can be adjusted easily to change the size and intensity, max calves size can be 28.5 inches with 2 size extensions included for different people to use.

BEST GIFT FOR THE ONE YOU LOVE-FIT KING is well-known for the highest quality products and offers serialized health massagers for home use or gifts from foot to thigh. It would be a great gift for your family members, friends, relatives...on the coming festivals.
